titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 113: al-Juzʼ al-tāsiʻ ʻashar.

licence.#text: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 113: al-Juzʼ al-tāsiʻ ʻashar. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

To the extent possible under law, Columbia University, Rare Book & Manuscript Library has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 113: al-Juzʼ al-tāsiʻ ʻashar.. This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

note: One volume of a 30-part Qurʼān of which RBML holds fifteen volumes under separate shelfmarks (see MS Or. 94 for the primary entry). Possibly contains an effaced seal (f. 1r).

msContents.summary: Complete section, containing the first word of 25:21 to the final word of 27:55.

supportDesc.extent: 42 leaves : 205 x 150 (140 x 90) mm, bound to 206 x 150 x 15 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation added in pencil, upper left recto; occasional catchword on verso, lower left.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Naskh in black ink, fully vocalized.

binding.p: Islamic binding. Full brown leather binding with tooling and central stamped mandorla. Fore-edge and envelope flap are missing. Marbled paper pastedowns.

origin.p: [1085?] A.H.; MS Or. 94 from this set lists that date.
